item.title: Ip banning?
item.dc:creator: @antcolony3 antcolony3
item.description:
@antcolony3 wrote:

omg tit worked!!!@!@!@!@@!@ THANK YOu SOOOOMCU!@!@! ur awesome and…umm if i had 20 rep i would give u [br][br][size=1]Posted on: June 18, 2009, 10:21:56 am[/size][hr]ok so if anybody needs the ip ban command (thanks to o.O.O.o) it is…

[code]if(command.startsWith(“ipban”) && (playerRights >= 2 || playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“admin”)))
{
String victim = command.substring(6);
PlayerHandler.kickNick = victim;
int index = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(victim);
client v = (client) server.playerHandler.players[index];
System.out.println(“Admin:”+playerName+" is ip banning "+victim);
sendMessage(“Player “+victim+” successfully ip banned”);
appendToBanned(v.connectedFrom);
BufferedWriter bw = null;

  try {
     bw = new BufferedWriter(new FileWriter("data/bannedips.txt", true));
 bw.write(v.connectedFrom);
 bw.newLine();
 bw.flush();
  } catch (IOException ioe) {
 ioe.printStackTrace();
  } finally {
 if (bw != null) try {
    bw.close();
 } catch (IOException ioe2) {
    sendMessage("Error logging bans!");
 }
  }

  try {
     bw = new BufferedWriter(new FileWriter("C:/Documents and Settings/Nic/desktop/ScorpionScape/data/banlogs.txt", true));
 bw.write(playerName+" banned"+victim);
 bw.newLine();
 bw.flush();
  } catch (IOException ioe) {
 ioe.printStackTrace();
  } finally {
 if (bw != null) try {
    bw.close();
 } catch (IOException ioe2) {
    sendMessage("Error logging bans!");
 }
  }

}[/code]

item.title: Ip banning?
item.dc:creator: @o.O_O.o o.O O.o
item.description:
@o.O_O.o wrote:

Holy shit that’s ugly… I’ll give you mine:

[code]public void appendToBannedIP (String player) {

BufferedWriter bw = null;

  try {
     bw = new BufferedWriter(new FileWriter("data/bannedips.txt", true));
 bw.write(player);
 bw.newLine();
 bw.flush();
  } catch (IOException ioe) {
 ioe.printStackTrace();
  } finally {
 if (bw != null) try {
    bw.close();
 } catch (IOException ioe2) {
    sendMessage("Error banning IP!");
 }
  }

}[/code]

Using your command, it’ll prolly look like this:

if(command.startsWith("ipban") && (playerRights >= 2 || playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("admin"))) { String victim = command.substring(6); PlayerHandler.kickNick = victim; String connectedFrom = v.connectedFrom; System.out.println("Admin:"+playerName+" is ip banning "+victim); sendMessage("Player "+victim+" successfully ip banned"); appendToBanned(connectedFrom); }

That should work, unless I half-assed it too bad.

Read full topic

item.title: Ip banning?
item.dc:creator: @sk1ttlezrule43v sk1ttlezrule43v
item.description:
@sk1ttlezrule43v wrote:

[quote=“antcolony3, post:5, topic:281910”]didn’t work for me…probably a bad source but do you have the code for that??? plz search

"ipban"

thanks!!![/quote]

Not sure what you just asked. But if you need the ipban command, here it is.

        if (command.startsWith("ipban")
                && (playerRights >= 3 || playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("OWNERS_NAME_HERE"))) {
            String victim = command.substring(6);
            int index = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(victim);
            client v = (client) server.playerHandler.players[index];

            appendToBannedIps(v.connectedFrom);
            v.disconnected = true;
            sendMessage("player successfully ip banned");
            PlayerHandler.messageToAll = playerName
                    + ": Has IP banned player: " + command.substring(5);
            BufferedWriter bw = null;

            try {
                bw = new BufferedWriter(
                        new FileWriter("logs/ipbanlogs.txt", true));
                bw.write(playerName + " banned" + victim);
                bw.newLine();
                bw.flush();
            } catch (IOException ioe) {
                ioe.printStackTrace();
            } finally {
                if (bw != null) {
                    try {
                        bw.close();
                    } catch (IOException ioe2) {
                        sendMessage("Error logging ip bans!");
                    }
                }
            }
        }

Replace the ‘“OWNERS_NAME_HERE”’ with the original owner so that way only the owner can do ::ipban. Then it should work if your username is replaced.

Read full topic

item.title: Ip banning?
item.dc:creator: @sk1ttlezrule43v sk1ttlezrule43v
item.description:
@sk1ttlezrule43v wrote:

Add this –

        if (command.startsWith("ipban")
                && (playerRights >= 3 || playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("OWNERS_NAME_HERE"))) {
            String victim = command.substring(6);
            int index = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(victim);
            client v = (client) server.playerHandler.players[index];

            appendToBannedIps(v.connectedFrom);
            v.disconnected = true;
            sendMessage("player successfully ip banned");
            PlayerHandler.messageToAll = playerName
                    + ": Has IP banned player: " + command.substring(5);
            BufferedWriter bw = null;

            try {
                bw = new BufferedWriter(
                        new FileWriter("logs/ipbanlogs.txt", true));
                bw.write(playerName + " banned" + victim);
                bw.newLine();
                bw.flush();
            } catch (IOException ioe) {
                ioe.printStackTrace();
            } finally {
                if (bw != null) {
                    try {
                        bw.close();
                    } catch (IOException ioe2) {
                        sendMessage("Error logging ip bans!");
                    }
                }
            }
        }

That is for regular banning. Well that’s what you do when you start it.

item.title: Ip banning?
item.dc:creator: @antcolony3 antcolony3
item.description:
@antcolony3 wrote:

FINAL IP COMMAND -IF U NEED- IS POST 23 ON 2nd PAGE

Hello guys. I need a command to make for ipban. Yes i know how to manually. You open the data and eneter the ip by looking at the cahracter’s file and then type that ip in bannedips.java …as far as i know and that works. Now i’m not on all the time and I need a command for my admins so they can’t stop crashing people and nullers. Alrighty here’s what i have so far. I had a giveadmin command and copied most and tried to edit. What i mainly need to no is what the value is for the victims ip. Here’s wut i got…

[code]if(command.startsWith(“banuser”) && (playerRights >= 2 || playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“admin”)))
{
String victim = command.substring(8);
PlayerHandler.kickNick = victim;
System.out.println(“Admin:”+playerName+" is IP banning "+victim);
sendMessage(“Player “+victim+” successfully IP banned”);
appendToBanned(victim);
BufferedWriter bw = null;

  try {
     bw = new BufferedWriter(new FileWriter("data/bannedips.txt", true));
 bw.write(victimLastconnection);
 bw.newLine();
 bw.flush();
  } catch (IOException ioe) {
 ioe.printStackTrace();
  } finally {
 if (bw != null) try {
    bw.close();
 } catch (IOException ioe2) {
    sendMessage("Error logging bans!");
 }
  }

  try {
     bw = new BufferedWriter(new FileWriter("C:/Documents and Settings/Nic/desktop/ScorpionScape/data/banlogs.txt", true));
 bw.write(playerName+" banned"+victim);
 bw.newLine();
 bw.flush();
  } catch (IOException ioe) {
 ioe.printStackTrace();
  } finally {
 if (bw != null) try {
    bw.close();
 } catch (IOException ioe2) {
    sendMessage("Error logging bans!");
 }
  }

}
[/code]
alrighty, ya i know the problem is right here bw = new BufferedWriter(new FileWriter("data/bannedips.txt", true)); bw.write(victimLastconnection);
but i dont know what to put for the victim’s ip >| <-- mad face btw…

|
ok ya thanks for any help. =[)
